ARABIC: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرِيكُمْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقًا وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is He who shows you His Signs and sends down provision to you out of heaven. But none pay heed save those who make tawba.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends you food from the heavens. Yet none takes a warning except him who turns to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He it is Who shows you His Signs and sends down provision for you from the sky. Yet none takes heed except he who constantly turns to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who has shown you the evidence of His existence and has sent you sustenance from the sky, yet only those who turn to God in repentance take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is He Who shows you His signs, and sends down sustenance from the sky for you; and none accept guidance except those who incline (towards Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is He Who shows you His Ayat and sends down provision for you from the sky. And none remembers but those who turn in repentance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He it is Who shows you His signs and sends down for you sustenance from heaven, and none minds but he who turns (to Him) again and again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you out of heaven provision; yet none remembers but he who repents.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He it is Who showeth you His portents, and sendeth down for you provision from the sky. None payeth heed save him who turneth (unto Him) repentant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends down provision for you from heaven; but none pays heed except the repentant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He it is who sheweth you His signs and sendeth down for you from the heaven provision. And none receiveth admonition save him who turneth in penitence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down provision for you from the sky. Yet no one takes admonition except those who return penitently [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He it is Who showeth you his Signs, and sendeth down sustenance for you from the sky: but only those receive admonition who turn (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is He, Who shows you His Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) and sends down (rain with which grows) provision for you from the sky. And none remembers but those who turn (to Allah) in obedience and in repentance (by begging His Pardon and by worshipping and obeying Him Alone and none else).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is He who shows to you His signs and sends down your provision from the sky. Yet no one remembers except he who is penitent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is He who shows you His wonders, and sends down sustenance from the sky for you. But none pays heed except the repentant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back [in repentance].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:13] He it is Who shows you His signs, the proofs of His Oneness, and sends down from the heaven for you provision, by way of rain. Yet no one remembers, [no one] is admonished, except him who returns penitently, [who] recants idolatry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He it is Who showeth you) people of Mecca (His portents) the signs of His divine Oneness, power and marvels in the ruins of the homes of those who transgressed, (and sendeth down for you provision) rain (from the sky. None payeth heed) through the Qur'an (save him who turneth (unto Him) repentant) except him who betakes himself to Allah.
